description: Returns detailed information about an accessor. An accessor object is a container that has the information required for token based access to your Ethereum nodes.

parameters.name: AccessorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the accessor.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the accessor.

nested_items.name: BillingToken
nested_items.description: The billing token is a property of the Accessor. Use this token to when making calls to the blockchain network. The billing token is used to track your accessor token for billing requests.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the accessor.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the accessor.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accessor. For more information about ARNs and their format, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: NetworkType
nested_items.description: The blockchain network that the Accessor token is created for.
